parameters: \N<Segi>Riia is acting strange... Let's talk to him.

DW_目標設定 管理所へ出頭する
\N<Segi>Am I to fight such a man...?
\N<Rozaro>Segi-san, it's me. Could you open the door?

\N<Rozaro>Segi-san, good timing. About our conversation the other
day...

\N<Rozaro>Yes, about our strategy for the battle against Zozoie. While
it's true we shouldn't face it without a plan, I think we
should first learn more about the enemy itself.

\N<Segi>That's so... Thank you very much for going to such lengths

\N<Rozaro>Well then, would you come to the tavern later?
\N<Segi>Yes, I'd be delighted to. Thank you very much.

\N<Hojiko>Sorry about this. It's rude to come by at this hour of the
night.

\N<Hojiko>Hey Riia, you still have that intelligent look just like
your mom and dad. Is your mom around?

\N<Hojiko>Is that so? Then, could you wake her up for me? I have some

\N<Hojiko>Well, you see, my wife is out on an errand tonight. That
leaves me alone and it's tough spending the night by myself.
You understand what I'm getting at, right?

\N<Hojiko>Riia, I'll be borrowing your mom for a little while, okay? I
have something important to discuss with her at my place.
Yes, a very important matter... hehe...
\N<Hojiko>Hey... you can stay over tonight, right?

\N<Segi>What are you saying... That's obviously impossible. We had
an agreement that today would be it, didn't we?

Kneeling on the bed, Segi faces Hojiko. She answers him

\N<Hojiko>Look, I don't want to say this, but if you don't start being

\N<Hojiko>Lady, I've heard rumors that you've been marked with Lyuda's

right? You willingly spread your legs for them, didn't you?

\N<Hojiko>Then it's ridiculous for me to be the only one left out. I
fought with you in the training corps. That means I have
some rights to you too, right?

Lifted up from beneath her clothes, there was the lewd

\N<Hojiko>See? This is that Lyuda's lewd ornament, isn't it? A woman

\N<Hojiko>If you're up for it, I'll make sure you understand that

\N<Hojiko>Right? It would be sad for Riia to find out his mother has

understand what you need to do, right?

\N<Hojiko>You're stubborn... aren't you? Alright then, at least let me

\N<Hojiko>If you're going to refuse even that, then maybe I should

She had no choice. Having her son learn about her

And so Segi, with a determined spirit for the man panting

\N<Hojiko>Haah...! Haah...! You haven't shown me anything yet! I told

With her hand still on Segi's clothes, Hojiko's eyes were

\N<Hojiko>Haah...! Haah...! I can't wait any longer... I'm at my

\N<Segi>Please wait, Hojiko-san... really... just wait a moment...
\N<Segi>Wait, please! No, the promise...! The promise is different!

\N<Hojiko>To have come this far right before my eyes...! There's no

\N<Hojiko>Hehe...! So this is...! This is Segi-san's... ah, down

\N<Hojiko>Just as I thought...! No matter how much you've been done by

\N<Segi>Ah... umm...! Stop... move away... let me go, please!

Hojiko forcefully pushed the bewildered Segi onto the bed.
His eyes were bloodshot, his breathing rough, and above all,

\N<Segi>Please stop! Your wife is here! This is wrong... so wrong!

\N<Hojiko>It doesn't matter! She's got a man or two over there

\N<Hojiko>Don't bring up her existence now and try to delay things

\N<Segi>I'm not trying to deceive you...! I just wanted to talk

\N<Hojiko>Hehe... here we go, madam! Don't worry... I'll make you

\N<Segi>Please... listen to me... hear me out...!

\N<Segi>Stop... wait...! There's still time... there's still time!

Hojiko, having forced himself inside, let out a bizarre

\N<Hojiko>Hehe...! These lewd breasts and... this beautiful pussy are

\N<Hojiko>So... right? Let's just relax and have fun on our end...!
\N<Segi>No, stop! I don't want this... ahh...!

\N<Hojiko>Are you going home, madam? It's late and raining heavily

\N<Hojiko>Don't worry about him. Didn't he say he wouldn't be home

\N<Hojiko>Oh, worried about your son? No need for that either. He's
old enough to understand. He'll figure out why his mother

\N<Segi>Please don't say such foolish things. I am not that kind of

\N<Hojiko>Stop it, that's not what I meant. Now that things have come

\N<Segi>What do you mean by 'things have come to this'? There's

\N<Hojiko>You're as stubborn as ever. Well, that's also one of your

\N<Hojiko>Alright, then just one more time... just once more, please?

\N<Segi>...I refuse. I've already told you I'm leaving...

\N<Rozaro>...Sorry to bother you at this hour, it's me. Can you open

\N<Rozaro>You're still awake, Riia. Where is your mother? I need to

\N<Riia>Right now... Mom isn't here. But she said she'd be back

\N<Riia>N-no, it's just... I thought I heard Mom's voice just now...

\N<Rozaro>I see, she might be close by now. It's raining heavily

\N<Hojiko>Hehe...that's good...!? So tight... Your pussy is incredibly

\N<Segi>No, that's not...ahh! I really...mmm! I really need to go

\N<Hojiko>You're feeling it, aren't you...!? Madam, you're the best...

\N<Segi>Ah...ahh! Plea...please...! Ahh! Mmm... Please, let me go

\N<Hojiko>No, no way... No spoiling the mood...! I've finally become

\N<Hojiko>Hehe... Instead of just one last time, let's enjoy ourselves

\N<Hojiko>What, what? Even Riia would surely understand. So, madam...

\N<Rozaro>Segi-san, sorry for the late hour. It's me.

\N<Rozaro>About your next opponent... It's about Zozoie. Apparently,

\N<Rozaro>What do you say, shall we go watch together? You might find

ロザロの誘いを受ける

About the purpose of the Military Training Assembly
About the Military Training Assembly regulations
・経典結社リュダについて

The religious society that conquered and destroyed Segi and
Yuia's homeland, "Dawn's Ear," governs its followers through
unique scriptures and military force.

It can be considered a vigilante state, which has recently
expanded its influence by subjugating surrounding
settlements with its advanced technology and military power.
・練兵会開催の目的について

They impose military service on one representative from each
family and make these representatives fight each other in
combat tournaments for training purposes.

These duels between residents are held simultaneously, and
afterwards, a few outstanding soldiers are selected to be
recruited into the Lyuda ranks.

After opponents are decided, the battle takes place after a
few days' grace period. During this time, the participating
warriors will devise strategies for the fight.

The duel is decided by death, incapacitation, or surrender.
However, even surrender does not guarantee safety
thereafter.

If defeated in battle, men are imprisoned and subjected to
harsh forced labor. Women are forced to live as the
concubines of the victors or Lyuda soldiers.

To win the training tournament and save her imprisoned
husband Yuia through the amnesty that comes as a prize.

To do this, she must gather information about her opponents
in the tournament, train herself in the ruins, and win the
competition.

As Yuia is imprisoned as a serious criminal, it is essential
to continue paying tributes to Lyuda to extend his life.
Segi must not fail to do this during the tournament.

If the tributes cease, it means losing the guarantee of her
imprisoned husband Yuia's life.

The side effect caused by Segi, who lacks combat experience,
taking the secret drug "Mind.Lyuda" to enhance her physical
abilities.

Her lust accumulates day by day, and when it reaches its
limit (maximum value 100), she will experience an
uncontrollable intense sexual urge.

To prevent this lust, she needs to lower the maximum value
through meetings with her husband Yuia or medication.
Engaging in sexual acts is also effective in relieving the
sexual urge.

The ruins that gave their name to the underwater ruins city
where Segi and others live. It was once a tunnel dug using
criminals.

Rare resources were excavated inside the ruins, but at the
same time, it became a dangerous place filled with poison
gas and rampant monsters.

The poison gas continues to seep out even now. However,
since Lyuda developed an antidote to avoid the gas,
exploration inside has become possible.

The story is divided into chapters for each match, such as
the first match → second match.

Gather information for your next battle in town, explore the
ruins to acquire money and items.

In scenes where useful information or events necessary for
story progression occur, a [■EV occurrence■] mark will be
displayed.

\C[1]Blue indicates \C[0]conversation events or story progression
flags, \C[10]red\C[0] indicates when an event scene is
included.

The story may progress by advancing the date. If you feel
that nothing is progressing, rest in your home bed.

If there is a \C[3]■Rest Possible■\C[0] mark on your home
bed, you can recover your strength and move time forward to
the next day.

In this case, minor conversation events that could occur on
that day will be skipped as time moves to the next day.

Also, each character generally appears in the same place. It
is recommended to visit places like the bar where Rozaro, an
ally, is or Irime's home frequently.

Segi's ultimate goal is to win the training tournament
without defeat. If achieved, she can save her husband Yuia
and their family can return to their former life.

However, if Segi is defeated by the men who target her in
the tournament, she will become theirs.

By being defiled by them, Segi will face an ending with each
of those men.

On the eve of the final match of the training tournament,
she must choose an ending with one of the men, whether she
wants to or not...
